Rule.name: JDBC Disable Provision
Rule.Description: An example Provisioning rule for the JDBC Connector that creates the Account(s) in the database.

Argument.name: context
Argument.Description: A sailpoint.api.SailPointContext object that can be used to query the database to aid in provisioning.

Argument.name: application
Argument.Description: The Application the account is being provisioned for.

Argument.name: schema
Argument.Description: Schema representing the data being provisioned.

Argument.name: plan
Argument.Description: The ProvisioningPlan created against the application.
